text:
As part of my work with the St. Vrain Valley School District Innovation Center, I am on the AI Leadership team. This team worked with Boulder County Parks and Open Space to develop a remote underwater camera solution (pictured above) for monitoring fish populations in a section of St. Vrain Creek. We trained a neural network to recognize fish and their numbers over time. In summer 2022, the team and I presented at the 2022 CSTA 2022 Annual Conference in Chicago, Il.
Contact: ICAI@svvsd.org
Team GitHub Organization
